dcterms:creator: Tjong Kim Sang
De Meulder
dcterms:description: The English CoNLL-2003 named entity dataset is used for named entity recognition tasks. It contains newswire articles annotated with four entities: LOC (locations), MISC (miscellaneous names), ORG (organizations), and PER (persons).
dcterms:title: CoNLL-2003 Named Entity Dataset
